article.description: Hooper Vint scored 18 points, including a key late free throw, as UTEP defeated Southern Illinois 71-66 in a meeting of undefeated teams Friday at the Corpus Christi Coastal Challenge.
article.headline: Vint scores 18 as UTEP shuts down S. Illinois late, 71-66
article.linkText: Vint scores 18 as UTEP shuts down S. Illinois late, 71-66
article.story: CORPUS CHRISTI, Texas -- Hooper Vint scored 18 points, including a key late free throw, as UTEP defeated Southern Illinois 71-66 in a meeting of undefeated teams Friday at the Corpus Christi Coastal Challenge. Earvin Morris had given UTEP (5-0) a 69-63 lead with a layup at 42 seconds left, and Vint added two free throws with 18 seconds left to ice the win. Southern Illinois (5-1) was paced by a career-high 25 points from Sean O'Brien, who also blocked three shots. Mike Rodriguez added 10 points. The game was tense throughout, with 10 ties and 13 lead changes. SIU's largest lead was five points in the first half, and UTEP's largest was nine points midway through the second half. The Miners shot 43 percent (22 of 51), and while the Salukis shot 41 percent (26 of 64), they made just 5 of 22 3-point tries. UTEP outrebounded the Salukis 37-33.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
